00007         class Email
00008         {
00012                 const default_subject = 'Message from Emeraldion Lodge';
00013                 
00017                 const default_recipient = 'claudio@emeraldion.it';
00018                 
00023                 public $name;
00024                 
00029                 public $email;
00030                 
00035                 public $subject;
00036                 
00041                 public $recipient;
00042                 
00047                 public $text;
00048                 
00053                 public $headers;
00054                 
00060                 public function Email($params)
00061                 {
00062                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00063                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00064                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00065                                 $params['subject'] : self::default_subject;
00066                         $this->recipient = self::default_recipient;
00067                         $this->headers = "From: {$params['name']}<{$params['email']}>";
00068                         $this->text = get_magic_quotes_gpc() ? stripslashes($params['text']) : $params['text'];
00069                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00070                 }
00071                 
00076                 public function send()
00077                 {
00078                         mail($this->recipient,
00079                                 $this->subject,
00080                                 $this->make_text(),
00081                                 $this->headers);
00082                 }
00083                 
00088                 public function make_text()
00089                 {
00090                         return <<<EOT
00091 Da: {$this->name}
00092 Email: {$this->email}
00093 IP: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']}
00094 User Agent: {$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']}
00095 Data: {$this->date}
00096 
00097 {$this->text}
00098 
00099 -- 
00100 Emeraldion Lodge
00101 http://www.emeraldion.it
00102 
00103 EOT;
00104                 }
00105                 
00111                 public static function is_valid($address)
00112                 {
00113                         return ereg("^[_a-z0-9\-]+(\.[_a-z0-9\-]+)*@[a-z0-9-]+(\.[a-z0-9\-]+)+$",
00114                                 $address);
00115                 }
00116         }
